page.title: 20Credits
page.content: Six upper juniors and fourteen lower juniors did this survey:- Jenny (p.11) and Richard (10 & 12) live at Demesne Farm. Rachel (6,7,15) did much of the writing. Emma (4) rode on the bus. Cameron (5) rode his bike. The other Richard (8) lives by Garway Hill. Matthew (9) lives on Brooks Farm. Huw, Christopher, Jenny and Joanna (14) surveyed the churchyard. Clare and Emma (3) did the interviews. Clare and Rachel distributed questionnaires. Cameron and Huw entered the counts. Everyone counted cars and questionnaire findings, and put together the other pages. Mr Fox polished it up.
